interval.description: Interval is the time interval at which the processor will aggregate metrics.

pass_through.description: PassThrough is a configuration that determines whether gauge and summary metrics should be passed through as they are or aggregated.

gauge.description: Gauge is a flag that determines whether gauge metrics should be passed through as they are or aggregated.

summary.description: Summary is a flag that determines whether summary metrics should be passed through as they are or aggregated.
